title: Halloween RP giveaway?
body:
Was just sent a link and referral.... If I get enough people to click my link I can redeem RP points...

Obviously this is a scam right? Don't see it anyone in the news section here on the main page.

Also like to note -- the page looked like the legit lol page but I wasn't logged in.. But I am logged in here..

Scam amirite?

replies.body:
So would be just visiting the site compromise my information?

I feel like my information isn't compromised until I get enough "points" and then try and redeem an RP card which is when the site would most likely forward me to my login information?

This is definitely a phishing scam!  We don't have any promotions like that to redeem RP.  Current events that are legitimate and available can be found at the [Teemoing ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/the-teemoing-2016)page.  Be extra wary about these sites, and be sure to check out our [account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide to keep yourself safe.  Hope that helps clear things up!
